TopicTitle: Hello guys! Here just in time for 1.0 hype!

Articles.Content: Hello KSP players, I have been lurking in the forums for about a year now and I plan on joining the hype when v1.0 comes out. I made this account a few months after I started playing and I never used it, so it's about time to make this *first* post! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome aboard, then! Certainly an exciting time!
